org.slf4j.Logger
@SuppressWarnings("serial")
public class GrailsLog4jLoggerAdapter
extends org.slf4j.helpers.MarkerIgnoringBase

A Log4j adapter that produces cleaner, more informative stack traces,

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
